item.title: Adding Always On VPN Routes with Intune and Configuration Manager
item.description: Introduction # Now Microsoft Always On VPN is not yet in my wheel house of technical skills, but when customers are using Resource Access profiles in Configuration Manager which are now depreciated, you need to find a way to ensure that devices are still getting Always On VPN profiles.
